### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE inventory (
    product_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name TEXT,
    quantity INT,
    price DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE sales (
    sale_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id INT,
    sale_date DATE,
    quantity_sold INT,
    total_amount DECIMAL,
    FOREIGN KEY (product_id) REFERENCES inventory(product_id)
);

### STATEMENT

TRUNCATE TABLE inventory;
